PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-02032010-02-23TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the VESSEL OPERATION RESTRICTION REGULATIONS, which will assist in the maintenance of an effective enforcement regime, promote the viable and effective use of Canadian waters, and will promote safety for both recreational boaters and commercial operators by providing a simple and consistent mechanism for safely managing sporting, recreational or public events or activities.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0034 Publication Date: 2010-03-17
AttachmentsAttachment
